title: Runes Refund
body: how exactly they giving us the rune refund?

replies.body: We made a more comprehensive post [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lEF4iRjk-blue-is-the-newip-click-here-for-faq), but the conversion would include Greater runes purchased before Sept 1 and pages unlocked with IP.  You'll need to complete the mission and obtain your BE from the hextech inventory.
I think you get a mission that rewards you with BE tokens, then you need to craft those tokens into the BE.
I get nothing from my old runes tho
id like to know the same thing.
